lead_paragraph: The company and its dealers have tried to solve the problem in the past, but only if owners complained.

headline.print_headline: Exhaust Fumes Inside Ford Explorers May Lead to a Recall
headline.main: Ford Explorers Under Scrutiny for Exhaust Fumes Inside Vehicle

snippet: The company and its dealers have tried to solve the problem in the past, but only if owners complained....
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Admin is investigating whether more than 600,000 Ford Explorers, from model years 2011 to 2015, should be recalled because of exhaust fumes which can reach passenger compartment.
